column5: pretty cool , you see the mouse dash across the road.
4 HP gotta love it!  and yes i did see the mouse.
4HP Hemi    That mouse startled the heck out of that horse too
That's a mole not a mouse. Seen lots in the snow up north.
Just like a group of people- the second horse from the left did all the work, and the others just loafed....
That was cool.. Looked like the mouse scared the Hell outta that one horse. Its impressive how much those beasts can pull

Yeah I have seen similar pull outs around here.... One friend of mine refused to be pulled out by horses because he had teased someone about having been saved by horses. So he sat there for 5hrs in the cold waiting for a tow truck LOL.
